attributes.action: Restrict all annual Council Tax increases to the real Retail Price Index
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This will force local authorities to cut their cloth to suit their income (as we all have to do) rather than just bump up their income (from us) to suit their cloth.

rejection.details:
There are lots of petitions on this topic:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=council+tax
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
